comingle.comms.sockets

Class PersistSocketDataPipe<D extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • comingle.comms.datapipe.DataPipe<Data,java.lang.String>
      • comingle.comms.sockets.SocketDataPipe<D>
        • comingle.comms.sockets.PersistSocketDataPipe<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - type of data this socket sends and receives

    public class PersistSocketDataPipe<D extends java.io.Serializable>
extends SocketDataPipe<D>
    Similar to SocketDataPipe, but this alternative implementation maintains open sockets to previously connected addresses. All sockets are closed only when close() is called.
    Author:
    Edmund S.L. Lam
